quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them. – Walt Disney
fact: Cranberries are sorted for ripeness by bouncing them; a fully ripened cranberry can be dribbled like a basketball.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I'm tired of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they are going and meet up with them later.
